about.title: About Electro Team
about.subtitle: Leading the energy revolution since 2020
about.text: At Electro Team, we are dedicated to delivering top-tier electrical solutions across Algeria. With years of expertise, our team of skilled professionals specializes in electrical installations, maintenance, and troubleshooting for clinics, offices, factories, and commercial buildings. We prioritize safety, efficiency, and quality, ensuring that every project is completed on time and within budget. Our mission is to create safe, reliable, and energy-efficient environments for all our clients.

features.safetyText: Certified electricians following strict safety protocols
features.deliveryText: We provide the highest quality yet the fastest service in the market

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive electrical solutions
services.installationText: Comprehensive electrical setups for new buildings, renovations, and expansions.
services.maintenanceText: Regular inspections and prompt repairs to keep systems running smoothly.
services.lightingText: Design and installation of efficient lighting for offices, clinics, and industrial spaces.
services.safetyText: Thorough checks to ensure all electrical systems meet safety standards and regulations.
services.energyText: Optimizing systems to reduce energy consumption and cut costs.
services.cameraText: Setting up surveillance and security systems to keep your premises safe.

whyus.title: Why Choose Us
whyus.subtitle: The Electro Team difference
whyus.certifiedText: All our technicians and engineers are licensed and undergo regular training
whyus.qualityText: We use only certified, high-quality electrical components
whyus.pricingText: No hidden costs with detailed quotes before work begins
whyus.warrantyText: All installations come with comprehensive warranties
whyus.supportText: Dedicated support team available 24/7 for assistance
